options: To speed up data access between CPU and RAM

question: What is the difference between 'affect' and 'effect'?
options: Affect is a verb, effect is a noun
Affect is a noun, effect is a verb
correctAnswer: Affect is a verb, effect is a noun

question: What is the purpose of the 'doctype' declaration in HTML?
options: To specify the version of HTML being used
To define the document type and syntax
To set the character encoding of the document
correctAnswer: To define the document type and syntax

What is encapsulation in object-oriented programming?
options: Hiding the implementation details of an object and only exposing the necessary features
Creating a new class based on an existing class
Storing multiple values in a single variable
Extending the functionality of a class
correctAnswer: Hiding the implementation details of an object and only exposing the necessary features

What is pipelining in computer architecture?
options: A technique to improve CPU performance by allowing multiple instructions to be processed simultaneously
A method of organizing data in memory
A way to reduce power consumption in electronic circuits
A process for distributing tasks across multiple processors
correctAnswer: A technique to improve CPU performance by allowing multiple instructions to be processed simultaneously

question: What is the purpose of a topic sentence in academic writing?
options: To provide evidence for a claim
To introduce the main idea of a paragraph
correctAnswer: To introduce the main idea of a paragraph
